titleStmt.title: A letter sent by General Monck to Vice Admiral Goodson to be communicated to the rest of the officers of the fleet, in answer to a letter with some proposals lately sent to him from them.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
Goodsonn, William.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Edenburgh, Novemb. 29. 1659. G.M. (i.e., George Monck, Duke of Albemarle).
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library (Early English books).
